articles.content: 8The final satellite of the GOES-R series of satellites, GOES-U, is set to launch on June 25 aboard a SpaceX Falcon Heavy. The two-hour window opens at 5:16 PM EDT (21:16 UTC), with the vehicle set t… [+11243 chars]
